chunks.text:
To ensure we are all aligned, it is mandatory for every team member to complete the HSSE Induction eLearning.

This training is not just a formality it is your guide to working safely and confidently every day.
  
The HSSE Induction will help you:

*	Understand the safety systems and procedures we follow at Chalhoub.
*	Learn how health and safety are managed and the role you play in keeping our workplace safe.
*	Ensure compliance, as all learners must complete this training within 6 months of joining Chalhoub Group.

Complete your HSSE Induction today to ensure you are aligned with our safety practices.
  	
COMPLETE NOW! <https://chalhoubgroup.us18.list-manage.com/track/click?u=101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a&id=885784fe9d&e=0385dbee45>
